content: the crochet peppermint candy ornament is an adorable adornment for your christmas tree - without the sticky fingers featuring bernat maker minis this tasty tiny hanging crochet christmas tree ornament or present topper can be made in minutes the whys of peppermint s association with the holidays might be up for debate but there s no doubt that this bright red and white confection says christmas to many - and this one is just too cute the crochet peppermint candy ornament is an adorable adornment for your christmas tree - without the sticky fingers featuring bernat maker minis this tasty tiny hanging crochet christmas tree ornament or present topper can be made in minutes the whys of peppermint s association with the holidays might be up for debate but there s no doubt that this bright red and white confection says christmas to many - and this one is just too cute
